title: Do Teachers have a Right To Defend themselves
itunes:title: Do Teachers have a Right To Defend themselves
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about a news story about a substitute teacher punching an autistic student, after the student hit her first. We also opened up the phone lines after Charlamagne's "Donkey of the Day" was about a scrub who killing his mother's dog after she wouldn't let him have sex in her home; so we wanted to know what did it take for our listeners to move out of their parents house?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
